name: io.github.Eronmmer/bloomfilter
description: Service that lets AI Agents search, register, and configure domains

environmentVariables.name: BLOOMFILTER_PRIVATE_KEY
environmentVariables.description: Hex-encoded private key for a wallet funded with USDC on Base to pay for domains and DNS operations

environmentVariables.name: BLOOMFILTER_API_URL
environmentVariables.description: Bloomfilter API base URL (defaults to https://api.bloomfilter.xyz)

environmentVariables.name: BLOOMFILTER_NETWORK
environmentVariables.description: CAIP-2 network identifier (defaults to eip155:8453 / Base mainnet)
